describe.zh_CN: §k????§r的研究，从魔力中发现了构成物质的元素，元素作为特殊的魔力，似乎可以来改变我的世界。\n元素可以转化到魔力，这是很容易的一件事，但反之则是几乎不可能的。
describe.en_US: §k????§r magician find Element as special kind of magic from Items, which has power to change the World.\nIt's simply to let Element convert to Magic, but it's almost impossible to let Magic convert back to Element.
